Package calcul

Class Lambert

java.lang.Object
calcul.Lambert
All Implemented Interfaces:
ICalculStrategy
public class Lambert extends Object implements ICalculStrategy
The Lambert class is responsible for performing Lambert shading. It implements the ICalculStrategy interface and defines the ray tracing calculations needed to render an image using Lambert reflection. The class also handles image creation and saving as a PNG file.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructs a Lambert object with the specified scene for ray tracing.

    • getCol

      public Color getCol(Point p, IObjetScene objetScene, int i, int j) throws Exception
      Determines the color of a pixel for a given object in the scene.
      Parameters:
      p - The intersection point between the ray and the object.
      objetScene - The object in the scene.
      i - The horizontal position of the pixel.
      j - The vertical position of the pixel.
      Returns:
      The color of the pixel.
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs during color calculation.
